projects.name: Explore Ease
projects.description: A comprehensive tour guide system built with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Features user authentication via Firebase, responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.

projects.name: BookBuz
projects.description: A React-based multi-page application for book listing and management using react-router-dom for seamless navigation and a responsive interface for book browsing.

projects.name: MANZiL
projects.description: A React-based multi-page application for book listing and management using react-router-dom for seamless navigation and a responsive interface for book browsing. This project has private routes and user authentication, and it is built with React, React Router, and Tailwind CSS, it has filters and search functionality.

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio built with React to showcase my skills, projects, and experience in web development. It includes sections for my work, contact information, and more.

projects.name: P-Ticket
projects.description: A web application for bus ticket booking with a user-friendly interface. Features interactive seat selection, booking confirmation, and responsive design for all devices.

projects.name: Pet Management Application
projects.description: A web application built with Flask and JavaScript for efficient pet care management. Features pet profile creation, care routines, and medication tracking.

projects.name: Tetris PyOpenGL Project
projects.description: A recreation of the classic Tetris game using Python and OpenGL, showcasing proficiency in game development, graphics programming, and interactive design.
